channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Font Awesome
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Font Awesome

item.title: CVE-2022-4478|2024-08-03T01:41:45.428Z -- unknown -- font%20awesome
item.description: The Font Awesome WordPress plugin before 4.3.2 does not validate and escapes some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in the page, which could allow users with a role as low as a contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks against logged-in admins.
